title: Partner & Community Marketing Specialist - KSA
content:
About us 





Tabby creates financial freedom in the way people shop, earn and save by reshaping their relationship with money. Over 5,000,000 active users choose Tabby to stay in control of their spending and make the most out of their money.
Over 30,000 global brands and small businesses, including H&M, Adidas, IKEA, SHEIN, noon, and Bloomingdale’s, use Tabby’s technology to accelerate growth and gain loyal customers by offering flexible payments online and in stores. Tabby is active in Saudi Arabia, UAE, Egypt and Kuwait and backed by leading investors, including Sequoia Capital India, STV, PayPal Ventures, Mubadala Investment Capital, Arbor Ventures and others.






 We are hiring for a Partner & Community Marketing specialist.
As a Partner & Community Manager at Tabby, you will be responsible for managing and engaging with our merchants and our channel partners. You will play a crucial role in building a sense of ambassadorship among our merchants and prevent attrition. You will also be responsible for building our the relationships with our channel partners and their marketing teams, creating co-campaigns and content to drive the number of merchant leads.
Location: Riyadh, KSA
You’ll be working in a dynamic, rapidly evolving environment with the following responsibilities:

Merchant community:

Proactively engage with our existing merchants to build a sense of ambassadorship and loyalty.
Create and organise both digital and in-person events for our merchants.
Together with our merchant content manager, create digital content that helps our merchants.
Create and manage a rewards program for our merchants.


Channel partner marketing:

Cultivate and strengthen relationships with our channel partners and their marketing teams.
Collaborate with channel partners to create co-campaigns and promotional activities that drive merchant leads and revenue.
Provide channel partners with the necessary support and resources to maximise their partnership with Tabby.
Manage the channel partner marketplace, where merchants can find our partners to help them grow their business.



We expect that you have:

Proven experience in partner management, community building, or a related role.
Strong interpersonal and communication skills.
2+ years of experience in community management, or related roles, preferably with a B2B perspective.
Excellent collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams and external partners.
Fluency in English and Arabic.

 
 What you can expect

We offer flexible working hours and trust you to work enough hours to do your job well, at times that suit you and your team.
A working environment that gives you autonomy and responsibility from day one.
You should be comfortable with the idea that the quality of your work will influence the shape of your career.
Participation in company’s employee stock options program.
Health Insurance

We are passionate about creating an inclusive, high-performing workplace that gives people from all backgrounds the support they need to thrive, grow and meet their goals (whatever they may be).
If this sounds exciting to you, we’d love to hear from you!

questions.label: Describe your experience in community management and how you've made an impact.
Have you organised digital or in-person events for merchants or similar stakeholders? Please provide examples.
